input.sentences: then | you must gather all of the ingredients
after that is finished | put everything in the oven until fully cooked .
then | you can serve it up to friends and family .
output.sentences: I wanted to start cooking, so I found a good recipe.
I gathered all of the ingredients.
I put all of the ingredients together.
Then I placed everything in the oven to finish.
Afterwards, I served it to my friends and family.
